item.title: Public Accountability
item.description: I’ve only recently appreciated the magic effects that public accountability can have. For years I have been struggling with a certain inner demon that has to do with a habit of mine. I fought with it endlessly, tried everything, and never really managed to slay it. Not even close. Recently, I’ve tried something different, and it worked really well: I made a declaration of my intentions to quit the habit to my friends.
